text: “Ndipo tidawaolotsa pa nyanja ana a Israyeli. Ndipo Farawo ndi asilikali ake ankhondo adawatsata moipitsa ndi mwamtopola, kufikira pamene kumira kudampeza; (iye) adati: “Ndakhulupirira kuti palibe wopembedzedwa mwachoonadi koma Yemwe ana a Israyeli amkhulupirira. Ndipo ine ndine mmodzi mwa Asilamu (omugonjera monga iwo akumgonjera).”
